含义.解释: The character '口' means 'mouth' in Chinese. It represents the physical mouth, an opening, or an entrance. It is also used metaphorically to denote speech, taste, or a person (e.g., in counting people).

字形.描述: The character '口' is a simple, square-shaped character consisting of a single, closed rectangle. It visually resembles an open mouth or a square opening.

字源.解释: The character '口' is a pictograph that originated from ancient oracle bone script. It was originally a drawing of an open mouth, which evolved into its current simplified form over time.

例子: 口若悬河 (kǒu ruò xuán hé, to speak eloquently)
口是心非 (kǒu shì xīn fēi, to say one thing and mean another)
口口声声 (kǒu kǒu shēng shēng, to keep saying)
口诛笔伐 (kǒu zhū bǐ fá, to condemn both in speech and writing)
他口才很好，演讲时口若悬河。 (Tā kǒucái hěn hǎo, yǎnjiǎng shí kǒu ruò xuán hé. - He is very eloquent and speaks fluently during speeches.)
她口渴了，想喝一杯水。 (Tā kǒukě le, xiǎng hē yī bēi shuǐ. - She is thirsty and wants to drink a glass of water.)
从前，有一个国王非常喜欢听故事。他下令全国，谁能讲一个让他无法开口的故事，就赏赐千金。一个聪明的农夫来到王宫，开始讲一个永远讲不完的故事。国王听得入迷，却始终无法打断他。最后，国王不得不承认农夫赢了。
古时候，有一个小孩总是口无遮拦，说了很多不该说的话。一天，他遇到一位智者，智者告诉他：'口是心之门，言语如箭，伤人无形。'从此，小孩学会了谨言慎行。

《静夜思》 - 李白
床前明月光，疑是地上霜。
举头望明月，低头思故乡。
(Although '口' is not directly in this poem, it is often recited and involves the act of speaking or expressing emotions.)

《登鹳雀楼》 - 王之涣
白日依山尽，黄河入海流。
欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。
(Similarly, this poem is often recited and involves the act of speaking or expressing thoughts.)
